issue.title: [C++][Python][FlightRPC] Support export_to_c in DoGet/inherit from RecordBatchReader
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12686](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12686). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`MetadataRecordBatchReader` should probably inherit from RecordBatchReader to make reuse easier and to support common APIs like the C Data Interface.
